bio:
Valla is a typical Nord woman who loves a good brawl, and hates magic. She is a very guarded individual, and doesn’t like company, as it has never amounted to anything for her. She will be interested in a friendly brawl if requested, and will respect her opponent greatly if they manage to beat her: something no one thus far has been able to do.
Quotes:
"Most people talk, and I don’t like what they have to say."
name: Valla
